plot: A short documentary about "noise" and the underground avant-garde music scene of Greece, through the eyes and ears of NoKalypse (one of the most influential artists of the scene).
title: Nokalypse: A Story of Inexistence
plot_es: A short documentary about "noise" and the underground avant-garde music scene of Greece, through the eyes and ears of NoKalypse (one of the most influential artists of the scene).
plot_en: A short documentary about "noise" and the underground avant-garde music scene of Greece, through the eyes and ears of NoKalypse (one of the most influential artists of the scene).
